resources.string: Welcome to The Eyedol App, this App is the condensed version of my website

I specialise in finding new ways for users to experience the data around us.\ After studying computer engineering, and being certified in France; trying to revolutionise the web in London, by creating cutting-edge applications and concepts; and leading a team of developers to using web development and its best practices. I\'ve acquired a wide range of skills, and an abstract thinking making me grasp new languages and paradigms quickly.
